entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 6:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: W 41 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
